title: C1097, C1098, C1099, C1100, C1101, C1102 - Tyre Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS) Wheel Sensors

body.body: C1097, C1098, C1099, C1100, C1101, C1102 - Tyre Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS) Wheel Sensors
C1097, C1098, C1099, C1100, C1101, C1102 - Tyre Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS) Wheel Sensors - Fault - CR8; CS8; PB1; PJ1; PJZ; PM1; PR1; PRC; PS1; PSC; PX1; PXC; PY1; PYC
Front wheel sensor unit battery alert
Replace the relevant wheel pressure sensor following the procedure described in the Triumph Diagnostic Tool User Guide
Record the new sensor's ID number into the Owner Handbook before fitting
Rear wheel sensor unit battery alert
Front wheel sensor unit fault alert
Replace the relevant wheel pressure sensor following the procedure described in the Triumph diagnostic tool user guide
Record the new sensor's ID number into the owner handbook before fitting
Rear wheel sensor unit fault alert
Front wheel sensor unit loss of communication error
Using the Triumph diagnostic tool, check that the correct ID number for the relevant wheel pressure sensor is registered to the Chassis ECM
Replace the relevant wheel pressure sensor following the procedure described in the Triumph Diagnostic Tool User Guide
Record the new sensor's ID number into the Owner Handbook before fitting
Rear wheel sensor unit loss of communication error
